Impressed by the maximal leader's attitude of power, AzureBlade bows down 
before her, his large form in front of her seeming rather amusing. But 
AzureBlade felt she was one of the maximal cause's most valiant defender.

AzureBlade:
I finally meet you, Iron Raptor. I am AzureBlade, and I wish to rejoin the 
maximals and have a chance to be forgiven for my sins. I was also known as 
Protoform Z...


>From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: Windlord/Chivtrons
>Date: Sun, 08 Jul 2001 17:57:27 -0700
>
>
>*Snarling, IR listened to Cyndro's report. Battle might be soon in coming.
>But not before she had enough information to go on. And with a thoughtful
>expression she nodded.*
>
>" Thanx, Cyndro. That's all I need to know for now."
>
>* And with that she continued walking towards HotRod's position, soon 
>seeing
>him and their guest in sight.
>If one looked at her now she appeared pretty impressive.
>Covered head to neck in thich, black armor. Large shoulder-plates, flowing
>cape and steps that nearly rattled the city. Impressive or not, it was
>unwise to get on her bad side.
>And with a metal ring of resting armor she came to an eased stop beside
>HotRod.*
>
>" I'm here. What's up?"
>
